title: 【1.2.5】【搬運】Herobrine mod
txt_content:
本帖最后由 28003027 于 2012-6-24 11:46 编辑 

你懂得
him
如果你覺得你的能力可以戰勝3頭end龍
那你可以試試這個自虐的mod
尤其是你覺得1個him太弱可以多放幾個召喚石召喚him
召喚石和成如下
[bone][bone][bone]
[bone][slow_sand][bone]
[bone][bone][bone]
[slow_sand]為靈魂沙
[bone]為骨頭
壇擺法如下
[bloodstone]
[bloodstone]
[slow_sand]
[gold_block]

[slow_sand]為召喚石

replies.author: zhouhonxin
replies.txt_content: 先把HIM引到一个山洞里，然后慢慢撸

replies.author: 52Dora
replies.txt_content:
图腾摆错了，是这样：
[fire]
[bloodstone]
[slow_sand]
[gold_block]
[gold_block]

[slow_sand]=召唤石
